title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to log into their account with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failed
description: Card payment is getting declined during checkout.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Billing address shown does not match the user input.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Invoice download button is not responding.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: OTP code is not being received by the user.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Auto-renewal option is disabled and cannot be enabled.

title: Profile Picture Upload Failed
description: User cannot upload a new profile picture.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Refund was requested but not processed yet.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer did not receive the order confirmation email.
